title: Bug 118780 - Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder after setting aliases for columns in the dataset, the expression builder still displays the old column names instead of the aliases.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. Notice that the old column name is displayed instead of the alias.
